entry.title: TYMO RING PLUS
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tymo Beauty
Type: Beauty and Personal Care
Price: 69.99

Introducing the upgraded version of the most beloved hair straightener that delivers styling personalization like never before. TYMO RING PLUS uses advanced technology to completely reimagine your styling experience.

Equipped with Nano Titanium Coating & 9 Temp Settings, TYMO RING PLUS flexibly adjusts heat to your unique profile, based on your hair texture, length and color treatments.

Fast Heating & Denser 3D Teeth reaches to the roots and allows quicker performance that saves you from morning rash.

Built-in Ionic System delivers smooth, shiny results and less damage in a single pass. Locks your style without overexposing hair to unnecessary heat.

* The default plug of this product is U.S. standard, if you order from other countries, you may need an adapter.

What is included:

  • Ionic hair straightening comb ×1
  • Detangling brush ×1
  • Travel bag ×1
  • Glove ×1
  • Hairpins ×2

Product Features:

  • Nano Titanium Coating for even heat distribution
  • 9 Temp Settings for customized hair type without unnecessary heat (250℉-410℉)
  • Fast Heat Up ready in 30s
  • Denser 3D Teeth for efficient styling
  • Built-in Ionic System to smooth hair, minimize frizz, long lasting the style
  • Safety Protection with Anti-Scald & 30 minutes Auto-Off
  • 360°swivel power cord
  • International dual voltage 110-240V
  • 1-year warranty

entry.title: TYMO RING-PINK
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tymo Beauty
Type: Beauty and Personal Care
Price: 59.99

TYMO RING is the new generation hair straightener. We've sold 500,000+ units in the U.S. market. It is the top-selling straightening brush since 2019. with TYMO RING, you save more time when straightening your hair. It can be transformed to straight when just brushing. The Anti-Scald design allows you to reach more roots of your hair. Comparing the traditional straightening irons, TYMO RING provides you better results (shiny, healthy, silky hair) with more volume. 

 * The default plug of this product is U.S. standard, if you order from other countries, you may need an adapter.

What is included:

  • Hair straightener X1
  • Travel bag X1
  • Glove X1
  • Hair clips X2

Product Features:

  • 5 temperature levels for different hair types(266℉-410℉)
  • 60 seconds fast heat up
  • 30 minutes auto-off
  • 360°swivel power cord
  • International dual voltage 110-240V

entry.title: TYMO iONIC
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tymo Beauty
Type: Beauty and Personal Care
Price: 69.99

TYMO iONIC is the new generation hair straightener you have ever tried. It is designed with MCH + Ionic technologies, anti-scald, and elegant touching feel. Simply brush your hair to straighten them. MCH makes your brush to be ready for use within 30 seconds, while the Ionic technology enhances the result with shinier, silkier effect, and last longer. It provides you a better alternative for straightening hair.

 * The default plug of this product is U.S. standard, if you order from other countries, you may need an adapter.

What is included:

  • Hair straightener X1
  • Travel bag X1
  • Glove X1
  • Hair clips X2

Product Features:

  • Advanced ionic generator technology
  • MCH heating technology
  • 30 seconds fast heat up
  • 16 temperature options for different hair types(170℉-450℉)
  • Fahrenheit/centigrade display switch
  • 60 minutes auto-off
  • 360° swivel power cord
  • International dual voltage 110-240V
